name: RentMoola
description: RentMoola is a mobile payment network.
overview:
RentMoola is a mobile and online payment network in partnership with Visa, MasterCard, Discover and American Express that allows renters and condo owners to pay rent, condo and other fees with their credit cards.

Online and mobile, auto-pay and one time payments, from rent, condo fees, parking and more. Use your favorite rewards credit card & stop missing out. Accelerate & elevate your rewards faster for trips and stuff you want. It’s fast, easy, safe and secure.

We offer a complete mobile and online payment solution, a simple 2.75% service fee and our MoolaPerks Program giving you access to exclusive discounts, offers and deals.

We provide our service to property managers and landlords at no cost along with our marketing kit to get each building RentMoola Certified quickly and easily. Once certified, property managers and landlords are eligible for our MoolaBack program. RentMoola also provides powerful cloud financial, transactional and accounting reports ensuring seamless integration into existing accounting systems.
